column5: Old man and I are going to hit Balsam tomorrow to see if I can catch my first ski of '08.  I've heard there is a government launch real close to Balsam Lake Marina, but I don't have specific directions to it.  If anyone could help out with some directions I'd appreciate it.
right  here  turn off 35 onto greywood, its right underneath the bridge for hwy 35
Good bass,n around Grand Island,just watch out for the rocks.
The only thing I want to boat tomorrow is the mighty esox
Sent you a pm BillM Here's a map to those spots I suggested.  http://www.fish-hawk.net/ Go to Fish-Hawk Projects then Ontario Map Project.  Stan
Hey Stan,  Thanks again!  I'll let you know if we tie into anything
